  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    BaseCache(CacheOptions cacheOptions)
    Abstract class acting as a parent to other cache classes and holds a reference to a Caffeine cache.
    It provides the fundamental methods (get, single invalid input: '&' all) that children automatically inherit.

  • Constructor Details

    • BaseCache

      public BaseCache(CacheOptions cacheOptions)
      Abstract class acting as a parent to other cache classes and holds a reference to a Caffeine cache.
      It provides the fundamental methods (get, single invalid input: '&' all) that children automatically inherit.
      Parameters:
      cacheOptions - The options that this cache will be setup with.
      See Also:
      • CacheOptions

  • Method Details

    • buildCache

      protected void buildCache()
      Creates the cache, with some pre-setup according to options.

      If the strategy is CacheStrategy.LAZY, we simply set the expiry after write and build.

      If the strategy is CacheStrategy.TIME_BASED we initialize a scheduler to update instead.

    • getSingle

      @Nullable public V getSingle(String key)

    • getMultiple

      public List<V> getMultiple(String @NotNull ... keys)
      Returns a new list containing only the values of the specified keys by calling `getAll()`, filtering out any that aren't in keys and getting the values of those left as a list.

      For a small amount of keys, calling `getSingle` for each one may be quicker than filtering.

      Some subclasses may override this to implement additional behaviour.

    • getAll

      public Map<String,V> getAll()
      Returns a thread-safe view of this cache as a Map.

      Some subclasses may override this to implement additional behaviour.

    • cacheIsEmpty

      public boolean cacheIsEmpty()

    • clearCache

      protected void clearCache()
      Invalidates all cache entries that are not being loaded, effectively clearing it.

    • clearCacheIfLazy

      protected void clearCacheIfLazy()
